member.name: MULTIPLE_TRUSTEE_OPERATION
member.summary: The MULTIPLE_TRUSTEE_OPERATION enumeration contains values that indicate whether a structure is an impersonation trustee.

member.name: MULTIPLE_TRUSTEE_OPERATION.NO_MULTIPLE_TRUSTEE
member.summary: The trustee is not an impersonation trustee.

member.name: MULTIPLE_TRUSTEE_OPERATION.TRUSTEE_IS_IMPERSONATE
member.summary: The trustee is an impersonation trustee. The pMultipleTrustee member of the structure points to a trustee for a server that can impersonate the client trustee.
